pullRequest.title: New Azure Services for Custom Field Interaction

commit.message: Feat(Azure Library): Add process service for the purpose of adding custom fields
Feat(Azure Library): Add project service methods for inferring processId and creating fields
Fix(Azure Library): Extract common replacement strings as constants

nodes.bodyText: Why not put the 3rd variable directly in the string?
Should this have projectId instead of project?
I think the third variable should be removed here as well or replaced with a static variable

commit.message: Fix(Azure Library): Extract API version parameter value into its own variable

nodes.bodyText: Is this used at all?  Does this need to be a generic object type or is there a specific object representation for the default value?
